title: How to beat Riven in any matchup (taken from reddit)

embed.description: Hi guys, I main riven and I've been playing her almost exclusively for a year now. Recently I made a long post about her matchups in another...

body: That's a great post showing how to beat riven with almost every matchup (except GP). It's not mine, just thought it'd be useful for all the people that can't beat Riven or just complain she's OP.

replies.body: actually riven takes a degree of skill to play PERFECT
But riven is faceroll freelo xdxd, she instantly win every game so OP volvo pls nerf ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
